channel.title: Court Wizard Ice Ward
channel.description:
Last game I attempted to Ice Ward the Hunter. That night he used his Bear to guard. I got the message that I was unable to ward him. This could be due to Court Wizard, Fool, Mercenary, Poacher, Sellsword (There was another class I cant remember). When I asked 12 what happened last night he said "I used bear to guard - thats why you couldnt visit me". I almost accused him because of the unable to block message.
Message needs updated to new classes please for us newbies.

item.title: Court Wizard Ice Ward
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Bear does not stop CW. Something else happened.

Read full topic
